original_text: The following were those who came up from Tel-melah, Tel-harsha, Cherub, Addon, and Immer, but they could not prove their fathers' houses nor their descent, whether they belonged to Israel:
korean_text: 델멜라와 델하르사와 그룹과 앗돈과 임멜로부터 올라온 자가 있으나 그들의 종족이나 계보가 이스라엘에 속하였는지는 증거할 수 없으니

sentences.original_text: The following were those who came up
from Tel-melah, Tel-harsha, Cherub, Addon, and Immer
sentences.korean_translation: 텔-멜라, 텔-하르사, 게룹, 앗돈, 그리고 임멜에서

sentences.original_text: but they could not prove their fathers' houses
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 자기 조상의 가계를 증명할 수 없었고
